website_summaries.verdict: A premium set of quality oils by a brand with a cult following.
pros: Kit includes the most popular and useful essential oils, allowing you to use single oils or create a custom blend
Recommended for those seeking medical or professional-level benefits
cons: Expensive for a kit of 10 oils compared to the others on our list – but fans swear by the quality

customer_reviews.title: Bad cap?
customer_reviews.text: I love the Doterra line. Really great. Upon receipt of my package of the Family Essentials kit, there was a strong smell. Upon opening my package I discovered that one of the bottles had spilled throughout the entire package. NOT HAPPY. Especially since they're not cheap. I'm unsure how that came to be. The leaky bottle looked as though it had a different cap than the other 9 bottles in the box. Either way, it made me pretty upset.
customer_reviews.author: T. Suhr

customer_reviews.title: Product Not As Described! Oils NOT FULL
customer_reviews.text: I would actually give this zero stars if possible. The kit came with all oils not even 1/4 full! Very dissatisfied and frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some Bottles smell rancid, some visible less full
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these, one for myself, one for my girlfriend and one for my mother. We all opened them at the same time. One of the boxes has a few oils that were obviously less full than the other two, and one of the boxes contained two oils that may have gone bad. They made a noise similar to champagne being opened when the lid was twisted off, and the smell of the oil was very off putting, especially when compared to the other two boxes that were fine, and quite pleasant. Basically I was really only satisfied with one of the three I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand behind their sales.
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with my product. When I opened the box the smell about knocked me over. Two of the bottles covers were not screwed on tight and had leaked all over the box. When I click on to return it stated I could not return this product. I paid over $136.00 for this. That is completely UNEXCEPTABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Dale & Debbie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Short on oil in the bottle and leaked
customer_reviews.text: Love the oils that is why I went with doTERRA but the bottles while sealed either leaked or were sent not full. When I opened the box it smelled like Deep Blue and upon inspection of the bottle was significantly less than others. In total I was short oils in lemon, deep blue and frankincense.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It does not smell right
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased doTERRA oils before and most of the oils I received have a strong smell, not in a good way. Deep blue does not smell right, I think just lavender and the breath blend are good. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has come in so handy! I have discovered so many things that these oils are good for besides diffusing. I'm glad I found it on Amazon so I can use my Prime to get fast delivery. It came new, and shrink wrapped. No question of the authenticity. I wish it wasn't so expensive, but that is on DoTerra, not Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: dbest57

customer_reviews.title: And so you know it’s not returnable
customer_reviews.text: Smell are horrible. You can find for this price I think better quality
customer_reviews.author: Kristina askim

customer_reviews.title: Loved this kit - I am a first time user ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit - I am a first time user and the oils smell beautiful- even to put on your skin it is not oily and dries very quickly. This kit had a range of oils and purposes of use - very helpful for the first time buyer! I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive Kit that was pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the Family Essentials Kit and not the Family Physical Kit as advertised. I was looking forward the additional educational materials on how to use the oils.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Bottles aren’t full.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed in this order. I love dottera oils and use them for everything, but this particular order consisted of bottles that were only 3/4 of the way full. For the money paid, I’m pretty pissed. If you’re looking for quality, I’d order directly from their website or one of their reps.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W.

customer_reviews.text: I love doterra oils. Not all the bottles were completely full which is a big deal when we are talking about just 5 ml of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Skundrich

customer_reviews.title: My first essential oil is Doterra recommended by my friend
customer_reviews.text: My first essential oil is Doterra recommended by my friend, but Doterra is so expensive in China, also not cheap in USA by comparing with other brands, I bought this family kit is for giving present to my friend, but I bought many other brands essential oil instead of DoTerra for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have this on deck for my family. Have used the breathe easy in the humidifier for our baby, and the lavender on our reusable cloth baby wipes. Comes with a little insert to tell you various household uses for each oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My family has used essential oils for about 4 years now and the doTERRA seems to be the most effective. We especially like the peppermint as a natural antacid. Their products work and there are never any negative side effects
customer_reviews.author: J Funk

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell for some of the oils not completely bad
customer_reviews.text: Some of the oils came smelling bad. The seller is very helpful and responsive. Sent me an email and informed me on how to verify the quality of the product. Terrible smell on some of the oils but not completely bad, I'm somewhat disappointed on the quality of some of the oils however I have verified that some of them were bottled back in 2016 so that might has something to do with the bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with my essentail oils
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my essentail oils. I have never used another brand so I can't really say if this is a better brand or not. I do know that these oils have helped with heartburn, headaches, stomach aches, bug bites, sore muscles and allergies! This is a great starter kit! I love using these oils and would much rather use a natural remedy for ailments rather than over the counter medicine. I will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Mahug

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and one of the bottles leaked and is almost empty.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: I love how doTERRA includes short, informative descriptions for each item and graphics that depict usage options; very organized and easy for a novice to proceed with confidence. A nice assortment that addresses a wide range of aliments, this for me was a nice 'starter' kit for our family. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these oils! Even though this is kinda a lot of money, its so worth it! You don't have to use much of these oils because they are such high quality. I first got introduced to doterra years ago and am just now buying more, because the small bottles I got years ago have lasted me so long. I put the lemon and peppermint in my water to make it taste better and get myself to drink more water. My daughter sniffs the "Breathe" oil when her nose is stuffy. I feel so much better when I smell these oils. This is a must have for every parent!
customer_reviews.author: Listen ToOurMotherEarth

customer_reviews.title: Lots of the oils came almost in half of the  bottle
customer_reviews.text: I just received the family kit and there are few oils that are not full at all. First time using the melaleuca y it only came with a few drops as you can see in the picture. Not happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed that it didn't come with any information with it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gift for my daughter in law for her birthday. She is very interested in your product. I was a little disappointed that it didn't come with any information with it on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I felt wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These products truly work! I was so sick last weekend with a severe headache and nausea, but after using the peppermint on my forehead, and oregano on my feet, and then diffusing the On Guard oil, I felt wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia W

customer_reviews.title: love this kit, always get it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS KIT! 3rd time I'm getting it, I definitley find I go through some faster than others so I've started to build my collection off of this one The crest price of nearly $100 is a STEAL! They're normally around $160....
customer_reviews.author: JMW12

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Oils arrived in tact, all unopened and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely professional and informative little pamphlet. Potent. Did not break in transit to NYC.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: So excited for these oils!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Trying to learn as much as possible to utilize all! Sealed/shrink wrapped. I recommend ordering separately some labels so you can see oil type from top.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Super excited about these oils iv heard great things about ...
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about these oils iv heard great things about them and this kit has a awesome variety. Unfortunately the tracking information is lacking and slow and hasn't updated in 4 days so I'm or to happy about that and would like to see the times and how far my package is traveling considering this is not a cheap purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm the best sister in law ever and her house always smells ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister in law! She loves it, I'm the best sister in law ever and her house always smells delightful when I visit with these yummy oils defusing.
customer_reviews.author: Domesticated Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday gift for parents!
customer_reviews.text: Great presentation with the package. All the oils have a great scent and really set the vibe. Not the cheapest but you are paying for quality so the value is really there.
customer_reviews.author: Arman

customer_reviews.title: Great oils,  no guidance
customer_reviews.text: These oils are amazing but there is no guidance in this "physician's kit" - there s no booklet to help direct when these oils are useful or how to use them
customer_reviews.author: 4OurLord

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Every bottle is not full, one of which is only a quarter full
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Loose cap wasted one of the oils
customer_reviews.text: The cap from the deep blue is loose so half of the oil was wasted and it mad a mess for the box and the other oils!!!! This should have been checked before packing the box.
customer_reviews.author: sica_40

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything offered in the kit is definitely beneficial to your health.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Badwah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT selection of oils to choose from... all the ones I use on a regular basis...
customer_reviews.text: I love these oils and this kit had all the flavors I use on a regular basis for my families care. I also thought it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. N.

customer_reviews.title: deep blue essential oil was not sealed correctly
customer_reviews.text: It came and I love these oils, BUT the deep blue essential oil was not sealed correctly and leaked all over the inside of the box so half of that essential oil was gone.
customer_reviews.author: lvssunflowers

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack to learn how to use essential oils
customer_reviews.text: We started really using this when we bought a diffuser, and I'm glad the wife bought the doTERRA kit. The oil discriptions are clear, and are high quality and potency.
customer_reviews.author: courtney skinner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Today when my kit finally made it. The BREATHE was replaced with DigestZen. Not COOL.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT doTERRA OIL KIT TO TRY
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this kit. It is a great way to try all different kinds of oils in smaller sizes to see which ones work for you. It came quick and packaged well. These oils can't be beat and seem to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: shopinful

customer_reviews.title: The quality and delivery of the product are both exceptional.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product and Amazon’s service!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Laliberte

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the scents however
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the scents however, the bottles were open and leaked everywhere! Not great for the amount of money I just paid!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: Love all the oils. These little packs were a gift from my kids and husband.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley V.

customer_reviews.title: So happy I gave it a chance
customer_reviews.text: This is my first oil set after several dermatologist visit failed to resolve several warts on my son's hands and feet. Oregano oil took care of the problem in about 4 weeks of applying at night. So happy I gave it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hoyle

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little kit with the most popular oils
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little kit with the most popular oils. I am very pleased with it. I started using it the day it came.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful emergency resource
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent kit to have on hand with essential oils for emergency needs. As a Nurse Practitioner, I highly recommend doTerra products and this emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tamah

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great way to start in essential oils. Love this kit and a must have for any family!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dombeck

customer_reviews.title: So far I love all of them
customer_reviews.text: I got this so that I could try these oils without investing a lot of money. So far I love all of them! I think I paid $103....I jumped on it at that price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doTerra Family Physcian Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit! It had just about everything you need to try different essential oils out.. I've already re-ordered a couple of the items.
customer_reviews.author: Meeteorite

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the doTERRA Family Physician Kit
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the doTERRA Family Physician Kit. I thought that the product was good and that the shipping and delivery were accurate. I like the peppermint from doTERRA, it seems sweeter than the other peppermints I have tried. I am pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Received my purchased fast but the deep blue bottle top ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my purchased fast but the deep blue bottle top was broken and leaked out so half of it is gone!
customer_reviews.author: krystle southard-tinoco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: The oils are highly concentrated and works perfectly in the vaporizer, I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: SERIOUSLY awesome and a great price! We love each one that we have used. They are about as real as you can get with no "Extras" in them.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the quality
customer_reviews.text: A great way to try out essential oils. doTERRA has quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Casey harrison

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about using an all natural remedy to help prevent us from getting ill but after using this for a few months I got to believe it's because of our use of this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Israel C.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have come with the materials you would get having ordered it from DoTERRA but I was after the included oils so I'm
customer_reviews.text: So excited to use this! Wish it would have come with the materials you would get having ordered it from DoTERRA but I was after the included oils so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: We love this kit
customer_reviews.text: We love this kit!! The oils work so well when we diffuse them in our room when we are sick
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Very pure oils. My family uses them for EVERYTHING. (Cleaning, self care, booboos, sickness, diffuser...etc)
customer_reviews.author: chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it everyday in my oil diffuser, ingestion and externally. Good price!!!
customer_reviews.author: oktollik907

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: definitely excited about this purchase. can see myself ordering again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Shober

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Excellent Scents
customer_reviews.text: The combination of the scents is great. I'd like to use Lemon for sleep and Peppermint for work.
customer_reviews.author: Jieliang L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these oils, but I have not used the signal ones as much. Love the blends
customer_reviews.author: Alanna M. Bobulinski

customer_reviews.title: This replaced our medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Literally all we have in our medicine cabinet is this, some Advil and some emergency migraine medication. We love how many uses this has! Especially when coupled with a diffuser, this can be used for all sorts of things! We have had little need for other oils, as the ones in this set fit just about every need we have. The box is good enough quality to permanently house these oils as well, so we tuck it on the top shelf of our cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Execllent, wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best product I've ever gotten from Amazon, I'd give it 6 stars if I could! I've been using the deep blue for my aching back and I've gotten the first good nights sleep in weeks! I've also used the breathe for seasonal allergies and lavender for skin irritations. Wow! Also, the carry-case that came with it is perfect. I only wish I'd gotten it sooner, there were some problems with the delivery, but I'm happy now!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. It arrived exactly on time and packaged great. I have been using some of the oils daily. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Want to use oils for wellness.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased, product is interesting and I am testing essential oils in place of prescriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Herman

customer_reviews.title: doTERRA Oils
customer_reviews.text: Love these oils and the explanation was clear what they were to be used for. Price was good, too. I have used these oils for several months and found them to be very effective. I have used other oils but like these much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I believe in this essential oils with my eyes close ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe in this essential oils with my eyes close . another thing to add to your medicine cabinet . worth every dime of it .
customer_reviews.author: Raul & Anamaria

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful deal on this kit. It is about $30 cheaper on Amazon. The oils arrived in perfect condition, no problems with broken bottles. If you are considering using DoTerra oils, this is a great way to start.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Came quick. Looks like the picture. Everything included and nothing broken. Does what it claims to do. This is a smart buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jezzy

customer_reviews.title: I agree it should be packed better. Value is great
customer_reviews.text: We also had one bottle that was open and some of it spilled out. I agree it should be packed better. Value is great.
customer_reviews.author: Deneice L. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Empty bottle in kit!
customer_reviews.text: When I got around to opening this package the frankincense bottle was completely empty. The seal is still on the bottle but there was nothing in it and the box smelled like frankincense and all the other bottles were sticky! I am happy with all the other bottles however I feel that I should be able to get another bottle of frankincense. I unfortunately opened it after the return date otherwise I would have sent the complete kit back for a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn Konruff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Have had this kit and I'm excited to have again and got same day shipping!! I would recommend this company anyday and will be ordering again soon. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: I like having a lot of oils to try out for a great price
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this kit. The oils where great.
customer_reviews.author: angel smalldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. It's my first essential oil purchase and I am so pleased with all the different samples!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted to get started with oils and at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my wife wanted to get started with oils and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: jn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the items had leaked out when I received them in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Manweiler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My oils arrived when they said it would. I havent tried them yet. I opened my kit & One of my oils was spilled all over and the oil is almost empty. That's disappointing.... I don't know who or how to contact to get a different one...
customer_reviews.author: ABE

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit! 4 stars only because there were a few oils (deep blue, lemon and oregano) I haven't used much but have become obsessed with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am new to oils so this is a great way for me to experiment and find my favorites ...
customer_reviews.text: I am new to oils so this is a great way for me to experiment and find my favorites before I buy more of one particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J

customer_reviews.title: Good place to start...
customer_reviews.text: Really this should be rated 3 stars for the overall worth of the product, but it is a well put together selection so I gave it 4 stars. PRO - If you are just getting into oils this is a great place to start because it contains a really good and useful array of oils for the beginner. CON - There are far better priced options in terms of getting high quality and pure essential oils. The extraction method is very important!!
customer_reviews.author: J. McDole

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Seller
customer_reviews.text: Lightning quick shipping, quality products & excellent prices, what more could you ask for? Will definitely buy from this seller again!!!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great product. Love the oils
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it a 5 star but one of the bottles had leaked and about half of it was gone. Otherwise great product. Love the oils.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Gross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came sealed in perfect condition at the right price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: patti snyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well for my sick kids and myself other oils don't work as well as these
customer_reviews.author: Dodge941

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if this were packed better
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this order is the little bottles were all rolling around in the slim cardboard box it came in. It's a miracle they weren't all broken. It would be nice if this were packed better.
customer_reviews.author: robert kent walker

customer_reviews.title: DoTerra Essential Oils
customer_reviews.text: Item came in a completely sealed package! It was way cheaper buying it on Amazon that from a rep. Love all the oils contained in the kit! I'm still learning how to use them which can take quite sometime to learn all the tricks to this!!
customer_reviews.author: Teena Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far my favorite scents to diffuse is OnGuard and Lavender
customer_reviews.text: So far my favorite scents to diffuse is OnGuard and Lavender. Great products. Will order more doTERRA products in future. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Natural remedies are always better than a visit to the doctor. I was skeptical when I first heard of do terra, but they actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good start
customer_reviews.text: Just starting to learn about essential oils and I found this to be a wonderful way to get going.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: but those I have used were great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased--have not used every essential oil yet, but those I have used were great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to see that some of the more expensive oils ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see that some of the more expensive oils had seals that had been broken. As I tried those first, I didn't realize it until I opened another oil that was sealed. Makes one wonder why?
customer_reviews.author: Raechel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a good way to experiment with several oils and to see if you like them.
customer_reviews.author: karla Frink

customer_reviews.title: doTERRA is great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try before I signed up to become a distributor and this was a great way to do just that. I got an excellent kit at a lower price than my doTerra rep could give me. I am very happy with this purchase and shipping was faster than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cindee Day

customer_reviews.title: doterra
customer_reviews.text: I'm learning about essential oils and this is a great start. would highly recommend for those who want a starter kit
customer_reviews.author: Candice L McMullin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. Just hate I waited so long!
customer_reviews.author: T. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My sister got this and I tried several of the oils. The are amazing and much higher grade than you can buy in any store. The Breathe is remarkable! It's a bit pricey, but lasts a very long time and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Micro Prof

customer_reviews.title: loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Loved it so much..some family members bought the kit as well! Definitely will recommend to everyone!! My kids like it too
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Kauvaka

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set because my best friend uses On guard a lot and I absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because my best friend uses On guard a lot and I absolutely loved the smell. It's woodsy and cinnamon-y but fresh at the same time. The oils are really good quality and amazing blends. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anahad09

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I work for another company, that sells Essential Oils. I tried this, and am hooked for life. There I a difference.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

product_meta.title: doTERRA - Family Essential Kit
product_meta.description: The doTERRA Family Essentials Kit contains 10 essential oils and blends—the "feel better" essentials that parents need on a daily basis to care for their families. Experience the infinite ways that doTERRA CPTG Certified Pure Therapeutic Grade essential oils can help you help your family. This kit includes 5 mL bottles of: Lavender, Lemon, Peppermint, Melaleuca, Oregano, Frankincense, Deep Blue, doTERRA Breathe, DigestZen, doTERRA On Guard
feature_bullets: The doTERRA Family Essentials Kit contains 10 essential oils and blends—the "feel better" essentials that parents need on a daily basis to care for their families. Experience the infinite ways that doTERRA CPTG Certified Pure Therapeutic Grade essential oils can help you help your family.
